DOC.brief_summary: There three-month intervention two group : judo train ball game , twice week , 50 minute . The sample consist child adolescent low socioeconomic status , participant philanthropic institution , age 6 15 year , randomize two group mention . Motor skill , physical fitness , cardiovascular parameter questionnaire assess socioeconomic status , quality life , physical activity level , screen time , sleep quality , back pain , food intake body image dissatisfaction evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Judo Training Compared Ball Games Motor Skills , Physical Fitness , Quality Life Cardiovascular Parameters Children Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: The sample 66 participant , randomize two group 33 judo 33 ball game . According sample calculation base study Bala Drid ( 2010 ) title `` Anthropometric Motor Features Young Judoists Vojvodina '' , analyze motor skill young judokas untrained control , use variable slalom 3 ball ( functional coordination age group 11 13 year . In difference mean 36.86 standard deviation 53.78 , power 80 % test significance 5 % boy . In girls sample calculation number ( 33 group ) use variable slalom 3 ball ( functional coordination age group 11 13 year , difference mean 10.45 standard deviation 15.05 , power 80 % test significance 5 % The present study approve Research Ethics Committee FCT/UNESP ( CAAE : 26702414.0.0000.5402 ) , number opinion 549.549 . Interventions Judo Training Judo intervention take place twice week , last 50 minute per session , divide general exercise : warm-up stretch specific sport ; Specific exercise sport : shock absorption , fall cushion ( Ukemi-waza ) , immobilization technique ( hon-kesa-gatame tate-shiho-gatame ) projection ( o-soto-gari , o-goshi , ashi-guruma , koshi-guruma , tai-otoshi others ) ; And fight simulation : randori . Ball Games The Ball Games take place twice week , duration 50 minute per session , divide general exercise : heating specific stretch ball ; Specific exercise sport : fundamental sport ball , exercise ball ; And game : game give end lesson work fundamental specific exercise general . Statistical Analysis We perform Shapiro-Wilks normality test , analysis variance ( ANOVA ) repeat measure effect size calculate Eta Squared , use SPSS Software version 13.0 adopt significance 5 % .
DOC.criteria: Be enrol philanthropic institution ; Be 6 15 year old ; Study opposite time project , intervention occur ; To present free inform consent form sign parent and/or guardian . Do take type medication influence evaluate variable ; Do present type orthopedic problem prevents accomplishment activity ; Not pregnant .
